sentences.en: Carcinoma of the oesophagus usually extends by local invasion and lymphatic spread.
sentences.cn: 食管癌通常通过局部浸透和淋巴扩散而扩展.

sentences.en: Does loose natrium of head Bao music treat lymphatic infection?
sentences.cn: 头孢曲松钠治疗淋巴感染 么 ?

sentences.en: Lymph nodes are round or bean - shaped structures strategically placed on lymphatic channel.
sentences.cn: 淋巴结是圆形或豆形的构造,它们被战略性地布置于淋巴管的经路上.

sentences.en: Objective To study the lymphatic drainage of the splenic capsule in goats.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨山羊脾被膜的淋巴流向.

sentences.en: Of , relating to, or resembling lymphatic glands or lymphoid tissue.
sentences.cn: 与淋巴腺或淋巴组织相关或类似的.

sentences.en: Of my little brother acute is lymphatic leukaemia, how should I do?
sentences.cn: 我弟弟的了急性淋巴白血病, 我该怎么办?

sentences.en: Other lymphatic system disorders include lymphocytic leukemias and lymphoma.
sentences.cn: 其它淋巴系统疾病包括淋巴球性白血病与淋巴瘤.

sentences.en: Pray for Rev. Ian Ma who has cancer in his lymphatic system.
sentences.cn: 为马益安牧师祷告,前不久他发现淋巴癌,开始接受化疗.

sentences.en: Results There were significant changes in diaphragmatic peritoneal mesothelium and lymphatic capillaries.
sentences.cn: 结果膈腹膜间皮和膈毛细淋巴管均发生了明显的变化.

sentences.en: Should lymphatic hemangioma patient notice which keep a field?
sentences.cn: 淋巴血管瘤患者应注意哪写方面?

sentences.en: The lacteals of villi are part of the lymphatic system.
sentences.cn: 绒毛的乳糜管是淋巴系统的一部分.

sentences.en: The lymphatic system also has a role in the immune system.
sentences.cn: 淋巴系统也是免疫系统的一环.

sentences.en: The stroma of all lymphatic organs is made up of reticular connective tissue.
sentences.cn: 所有淋巴器官的间质由网状结缔组织组成.

sentences.en: The tourniquet should occlude venous and lymphatic return.
sentences.cn: 止血带应阻断静脉及淋巴回流.

sentences.en: Twists can help detoxify the internal organs and lymphatic system.
sentences.cn: 扭转有助于提高内部器官和淋巴系统的解毒功能.
